jumbotron.title: Beautiful Wikis for Teams
jumbotron.main_text: Wikis don’t have to be ugly, complex and hard to manage. Welcome to the future of the Wiki.

benefits.main_title: How can SlimWiki help your team?
benefits.main_text: Simple, versatile and powerful features and incredibly low friction content creation mean that your team spend their time focussing on your business.
benefits.first_text: We have thought carefully about design so you don’t have to. You need only focus on your content, we make it look amazing
benefits.second_text: Simple drag/drop placement and layout of images and files helps you produce rich, useful content easily
benefits.third_text: Every change made is stored so it is easy to compare pages, quickly see who made which changes and revert changes
benefits.fourth_text: Your data is secure, backed up and exportable at all times.
benefits.fifth_text: Content can be visible to your whole company, restricted to a specific Team of people or visible only to the content creator
benefits.sixth_text: Careful optimization of the user experience and fast performance means a low barrier for content creation and editing
benefits.seventh_text: SlimWiki looks stunning on desktop, tablet or phone. Our fully responsive design adjusts perfectly to fit all your devices
benefits.eighth_text: Coming soon - Choose a layout that matches the culture and style of your team
